hajimenokizu <mg_batt@...> wrote:          
  Although I haven't read the story you mentioned, don't worry I haven't  read a lot of stories lately... LOL! I just wanted to congratulate you  on this very nice piece of work. I've seen a lot of doujinshi for the  Shinsengumi and yours has a very nice art style and -organization-. It  is very clean. 
  
  I wish there were more people interested in making doujinshi, so that  we can actually have more in English. So salutations to you. :)
  
  ~Kizu
  
  Thank you very much.   Simple words like yours are the fuel  that keep me drawing no matter what ^____^   I really do  appreshiate it and I'm always overjoyed when I know that someone has  also enjoyed what I do.   Words can't describe just how happy  & jittery I get.   Thank you very much.
  
  -Bunneh
